context.p: So you've learned about our company and you want to move forward with renting a classroom? Follow these simple steps to reserving a room through AirClassroom!

step.info: A profile on AirClassroom is essential to using the services provided by our company. It gives you direct access to renting a classroom, editing existing rentals, or cancelling reservations if need be. Profiles also help our representatives to offer you specific advice or promotions based on your classroom needs.
Choose between Shanks 160 or 360 based on availabitlity or preference. Both classrooms are sufficiently equipped to provide you with the space and ammenities for your needs.

Because there are some classes held in these rooms during the work week, AirClassroom cannot provide complete access to them 24/7. However, by partnering with Virginia Tech, AirClassroom is able to offer these rooms to users during an array of dates and times to accommodate their schedules and requirements. Choose the day and time that best fits your demand.

Once everything is in order above, and your selections are made, select Submit Rental Request to complete the rental process. You will receive a same-day confirmation email to the contact information provided on your profile with the details of your room rental.
